content: cape gingham by julia e sprague with thanks to wendy who planted the seed size women s medium materials 1 set of 5 us2 dpn s 1 skein sportweight lorna s laces in natural and 1 skein sportweight lorna s laces in red rover 1 tapestry needle for weaving in ends gauge about 7 ½ stitches per inch in stockinette abbreviations k knit p purl sl slip as if to purl * repeat items between asterisks as a unit ssk slip two stitches one at a time as if to knit then knit them together k2tog knit two stitches together sts stitches about the charts all stitches are knit red blocks correspond to red yarn and white blocks to white yarn leg with natural cast on 60 stitches using the cable cast on and join in the round knit 12 rounds of k2 p2 ribbing knit 1 row join red yarn and knit three vertical repeats of the leg chart you will repeat each line of the chart 6 times to complete a round 60 stitches cut white yarn and continue with red only heel flap working on 30 stitches and knitting back and forth setup row 1 sl1 knit across turn setup row 2 sl1 purl across turn work 7 repeats of row 1-4 row 1 * sl1 k1 * turn row 2 sl1 purl across turn row 3 sl1 * sl1 k1 * k1 turn row 4 sl1 purl across turn heel turn setup- sl1 k19 ssk turn row 1 sl1 p10 p2tog turn row 2 sl1 k10 ssk turn repeat row 1 and 2 until all stitches are consumed ending on a purl row cut red yarn gusset setup rejoin red and white yarns at the left side of the instep with the instep facing you take a photo pick up 17 stitches along the side of the heel flap in pattern following the sole chart continue knitting in this pattern across the heel and pick up 17 more stitches down the other side of the heel flap still in this pattern knit row 1 of the leg pattern across the instep round 1 ssk knit across sole using sole chart k2tog knit across instep using leg chart round 2 knit across sole using sole chart knit across instep using leg chart repeat rounds 1 and 2 until there are 60 stitches total then continue with round 2 only until sock measures about 1 ¾ inches less than desired foot length cut red yarn and knit one round even with white yarn toe round 1 k1 ssk knit across sole until 3 stitches remain k2tog k1 k1 ssk knit across instep until 3 stitches remain k2tog k1 round 2 knit across sole and instep repeat rounds 1 and 2 five times then repeat round 1 only until 16 stitches total remain graft toe copyright 2010 julia sprague stingdragon@gmail com
